zone.line: Peace Monster—I come now! farewell
Apollo
Farewell!— 135
Scene Caucasus, Prometheus, Hercules, Asia
borne by the spirit of the Hour
Panthea Ione, the Earth. Spirits—
Hercules unbinds Prometheus who descends
Hercules
Most glorious among Spirits, thus doth strength
To wisdom courage & long suffering love
And thee, who art the form they animate
Minister, like a slave
Prometheus
Thy gentle words
Are sweeter even than freedom long desired 140
And long delayed. Asia, thou light of life,
Shadow of beauty unbeheld, & ye
Fair sister-nymphs who make long years of pain
Sweet to remember through your love & care
Henceforth we will not part. There is a Cave
All overgrown with trailing odorous plants
Which curtain out the day with leaves & flowers
